Class LoginManager

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.Controller.LoginManager
public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
The Class LoginManager handles login related functions.
Author:
Guat Kwan, Wei Xing, Ashton, Yi Bai, Zhe Ming

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Retrieves user from database and verifies username and password. Returns null if user does not exist or password does not match.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the user object

    • verifyLogin

      public static boolean verifyLogin​(User user, java.lang.String password)
      Verify input password against user's password
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      password - the password
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • isWithinPeriod

      public boolean isWithinPeriod​(User user)
      Check if login is within access period if user is student.
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      Returns:
      true, if it is within access period
